page.title: 04HAREFIELD'S LISTED BUILDINGS
page.content: The village boundaries have seen very little alteration since the middle of the seventeenth century.A consequence of this fact is that the parish contains a large variety of old buildings - many of which are "listed" for preservation by both national and local agencies.There are 29 which are officially listed and a further 16 that are to be found on the local list. CATEGORIES OF LISTED BUILDINGS. Almshouses 1 Bridges 1 Churches 2 Cottages 8 Farm Buildings 10 Ind. Buildings 3 Large Houses 10 Pubs & Inns 4 Small Houses 7
